dct_title_s: نقشۀ جامع شبکۀ راه آهن جمهورى اسلامى ايران و محور‌هاى ترانزيتى = General map of railways, Islamic Republic of Iran & its transit corridors / طرح، تهيه، و چاپ از، گيتا شناسى. (Verso)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Title from panel. Includes color illustrations and notes. Text, train dispatching routes, and distance chart on verso. "267." "Iranian Islamic Republic Railways".
